Name: The Corporation of the Trustees of the Order of the Sisters of Mercy in Queensland - Brisbane Congregation

About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. Reference assistance available in person.

About.Acquisition focus: Past and present history of the Congregation -education; care of the sick in hospitals and nursing homes; social welfare; missions to Papua New Guinea, Cambodia, Pakistan, Philippines.

About.Guides: Entries in National Library of Australia Guide to Collections of Manuscripts Relating to Australia.
